meanings.sent1: She is persuadable and willing to listen to different opinions.
meanings.sent2: He is a persuadable person who can change his mind based on new information.
meanings.sent3: The persuadable cat finally agreed to try the new brand of food.
meanings.sent4: Her persuadable nature was like a blank canvas waiting for colorful ideas.
meanings.sent5: The idea of going to the park was so persuadable that everyone wanted to join.

meanings.definition: Open to being convinced or influenced.
meanings.sent1: The team leader was persuadable and considered all suggestions.
meanings.sent2: Being persuadable can lead to exploring new possibilities and ideas.
meanings.sent3: The persuadable robot followed every command with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a persuadable door, easily swayed by different arguments.
meanings.sent5: The persuadable nature of the clouds allowed the sun to peek through.
